text: @nytimes The Fake News Media told everyone to stay home and postpone all normal checks. Now they are realizing the effects of their fake advise. No dental cleaning, health checks, etc. Unless you have CoronaVirus symptoms people should not go to the hospital. Nicely done idiots.
